reviewtext: I had three extension cords piggybacked into two wall outlets. That is not good, so I ordered this thinking it probably wouldn't be worth the money. BUT it was !!! This was a very heavy duty item as well as a strip cord.  I was able to systematically remove the electrical nightmare. And now I also have one free outlet on that wall socket. I am impressed. So much so I will be buying another.
summary: Reduced fire potential at my home.
